input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents
input_text.Response A: The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral) is the perfect combination of style and function. With its sleek, lightweight design and 20 vents, it will keep you cool and comfortable on even the longest rides. The Acu Dial fit system ensures a perfect fit, while the snap-fit visor provides extra protection from the sun. Made with an In-Mold polycarbonate shell and EPS liner, this helmet is built to last. So whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, the Skyla is the perfect choice for anyone who wants to look and feel great on the road.
input_text.Response B:
Sure thing! Here's a product description for the Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet in short, simple language:

"Wow, look at this cool helmet! It's pink and purple and has a special visor that snaps into place. It's super light and has lots of air holes to keep your head cool. Plus, it's really safe and has a special fit system to make sure it's comfy. It's perfect for your bike rides!"

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
